[S] – [REST this card] If you have another《Anniversary》or《Morfonica》Character, send this card to Stock
[S] – BRAINSTORM [(1) REST this card] Flip the top four cards of your Deck, send them to Waiting Room. For each Climax among those cards, search your Deck for up to one《Anniversary》or《Morfonica》Character, reveal it to your opponent, add it to Hand, shuffle your Deck afterwards.

[A] – When this card attacks, if you have another Yellow Character, during this turn, this card gains +3000 Power.
[A] – CX COMBO When [変身の術？] is placed in your Climax Zone, if you have two or more other Yellow Characters, until end of opponent’s next turn, this card gains the following two effects:
-[C] – During your opponent’s turn, this card cannot be REVERSE.
-[A] – [(1)] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you did, during this attack, perform Trigger Check twice during Trigger Step.

[A] – When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, you may send the top card of your Clock to Waiting Room.
[A] – CX COMBO When this card attacks, if you have [笑顔が集まる場所へ！] in your Climax Zone, if you have four or more other《Anniversary》or《Hello, Happy World!》Characters, send the bottom four cards of your opponent’s Deck to Waiting Room, deal X damage to your opponent. X is the number of Soul Trigger icons sent to Waiting Room by this effect. (Damage can be cancelled)

[A] – When this card attacks, look at the top two cards of your Deck, choose up to one card among them, place it on top of Deck, send the remaining cards to Waiting Room.
[A] – When this card attacks, if you have no other Characters in Back Row, you may send the top card of your Deck to Waiting Room. If that card is a Level 0 or lower Character, you may place it in any slot in Back Row.

[C] – CX COMBO If you have [変身の術？] in your Climax Zone, this card gains Choice Trigger Icon in all Zones.
[C] – You may choose [みんな、行くわよー！] with the effect of Choice.
[S] – BRAINSTORM [(1) REST this card] Flip the top four cards of your Deck, send them to Waiting Room. For each Climax among those cards, choose up to one Character in your Waiting Room, add it to Hand.

[A] – When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, choose one of your opponent’s Characters and one of that Character’s traits, during this turn, that Character loses that trait.
[A] – [(1) Send one card from Hand to Waiting Room] When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, you may pay the cost. If you did, search your Deck for up to one《Anniversary》or《Morfonica》Character, reveal it to your opponent, add it to Hand, shuffle your Deck afterwards.

[C] – If you are Level 2 or higher or this card has a Marker underneath it, during your turn, all of your other《Anniversary》or《Hello, Happy World!》Characters gain +X Power. X is your Level x1000.
[A] – When your Character Trigger Checks a Climax with Choice as its Trigger Icon, you may choose one card in your opponent’s Waiting Room, place it on bottom of Deck, choose one of your Characters, during this turn, it gains +1000 Power.

[A] – [(2)] When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, if you have four or more other《Anniversary》or《Hello, Happy World!》Characters, you may pay the cost. If you did, your opponent returns all of their Stock to Deck, shuffle their Deck, send the same number of cards from top of Deck to Stock.

[C] – For each of your other《Anniversary》or《Pastel*Palettes》Characters in your Back Row, this card gains +1500 Power.
[A] – When [最高のおもてなし] is placed in your Climax Zone, if this card is in Front Row, choose one of your other《Anniversary》or《Pastel*Palettes》Characters, STAND them.
[A] – [(1)] At the beginning of Encore Step, if you have no other REST Characters, you may pay the cost. If you did, REST this card.

[C] – If you have two or less Climaxes in your Waiting Room, this card gets -1 Level in your Hand.
[A] – When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, choose up to one Yellow Character in your Waiting Room, send it to Stock, perform the following effect:
-You may choose one of your opponent’s Level 1 or higher Characters. If you did, your opponent chooses one Level X or lower Character in their Waiting Room, exchange them. X the chosen Character’s Level -1.

[A] – [Send two《Anniversary》or《Hello, Happy World!》Characters from Hand to Waiting Room] When this card is placed on Stage from Hand or from Stage to Waiting Room, you may pay the cost. If you did, look at up to two cards from the top of your Deck, choose up to one card, add it to Hand, send the remaining cards to Stock in any order.

[A] – When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, send the top two cards of your Deck to Waiting Room. If there is a Level 0 or lower Character among those cards, during this turn, this card can Side Attack without Soul Penalty.
[A] – [Send one card from Hand to Waiting Room] When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, you may pay the cost. If you did, choose one [SNS映え？] in your Waiting Room, add it to Hand.

[A] – When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, if you have another《Anniversary》or《Hello, Happy World!》Character, this card gains +2000 Power.
[A] – When this card attacks, if the Character in front of this card is Level 2 or lower, during this turn, this card gains +6000 Power.

[A] – When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, during this turn, this card gains +X Power. X is the number of your other《Anniversary》or《Morfonica》Characters x500.
[A] – [Send one card from Hand to Waiting Room] When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, you may pay the cost. If you did, choose one Level 0 or lower Character in your Waiting Room, place it on any slot on Stage.

[A] – When this card is REVERSE, if this card’s battle opponent’s Level is higher than your opponent’s Level, you may send that Character to Stock. If you did, send the bottom card of opponent’s Stock to Waiting Room.

[C] – For each Character in your opponent’s Back Row, this card gains +1000 Power.
[A] – When this card is placed on Stage from Hand or Waiting Room, during this turn, this card gains the following effect:
-[A] – This effect activates up to once per turn. When this card’s dealt damage is canceled, you may deal one damage to your opponent. (Damage can be canceled)

[C] – All of your other《Anniversary》or《Hello, Happy World!》Characters gain +500 Power.

[S] – [REST this card] Choose one of this card’s [“千年に一度の夜”奥沢美咲] marker and this card, exchange them. If you did, at the end of your turn, exchange that Character and this card.
